column6: Worst product I've ever purchased on Amazon
column9: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2021
column14: If you have sensitive, itchy skin, possibly with allergies or eczema, this is NOT for you. You likely avoid scented products because they might irritate your skin. But this product isn't even lightly scented; the scent is so overwhelming I almost threw up in the shower. I had to exfoliate afterwards and rewash my skin to get this gross stuff off. I threw it away after one use. I'm not even going to bother asking for a refund. WORST PRODUCT ON AMAZON!

column9: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2020
column14: I have sensitive skin and sometimes the weirdest things flare it up. This time I was itchy all over and had weird, what I only describe as open boo boos from scratching and such. I ordered this and showered once with it and the itching has subsided and my skin is soft, smooth and smells so good. I highly recommend this for dry, itchy skin!

column14: Love this soap!  The smell is great, not overpowering just right.  I keep washing my hands to keep the smell.  Smells lovely in the shower also.
